title: Product Configurator and CRM Web Application
name: INSOLE 360
description: Product configurator software and custom CRM for Motion & Balance company, responsible for automating the main workflow.
Java and Spring Boot for backend with PostgreSQL database with JSONB column types for flexible configuration and product historification.
Access management with RBAC (Role Based Access Control) implemented with Spring Security and token-based authentication combining Spring Session with Redis.
React with TypeScript and Vite for frontend handling routing and global state management and asynchronous data with TanStack libraries.
Agile SCRUM development and productivity ratio measurement (e.g., 120 lines of code/hour).
